55 namespace moveit {
56 namespace task_constructor {
57 
58 /* A container needs to decouple its own (external) interfaces
59  * from those (internal) of its children.
60  * Both, the container and the children have their own pull interfaces: starts_ and ends_.
61  * The container forwards states received in its pull interfaces to the
62  * corresponding interfaces of the children.
63  * States pushed by children are temporarily stored in pending_backward_ and pending_forward_.
64  *
65  * Solutions found by the children need to be lifted from the internal level to the
66  * external level. To this end, we remember the mapping from internal to external states.
67  *
68  * Note, that there might be many solutions connecting a single start-end pair.
69  * These solutions might origin from different children (ParallelContainer)
70  * or from different solution paths in a SerialContainer.
71  */
72 class ContainerBasePrivate : public StagePrivate
73 {
74  friend class ContainerBase;
75  friend void swap(StagePrivate*& lhs, StagePrivate*& rhs);
76 
77 public:
78  using container_type = StagePrivate::container_type;
79  using iterator = container_type::iterator;
80  using const_iterator = container_type::const_iterator;
81  using NonConstStageCallback = std::function<bool(Stage&, int)>;
82 
83  inline const container_type& children() const { return children_; }
84 
89  const_iterator childByIndex(int index, bool for_insert = false) const;
90 
92  bool remove(ContainerBasePrivate::const_iterator pos);
93 
95  bool traverseStages(const ContainerBase::StageCallback& processor, unsigned int cur_depth,
96  unsigned int max_depth) const;
97 
99  bool traverseStages(const NonConstStageCallback& processor, unsigned int cur_depth, unsigned int max_depth) {
100  const auto& const_processor = [&processor](const Stage& stage, unsigned int depth) {
101  return processor(const_cast<Stage&>(stage), depth);
102  };
103  return const_cast<const ContainerBasePrivate*>(this)->traverseStages(const_processor, cur_depth, max_depth);
104  }
105 
106  void validateConnectivity() const override;
107 
108  // Containers derive their required interface from their children
109  // UNKNOWN until resolveInterface was called
110  InterfaceFlags requiredInterface() const override { return required_interface_; }
111 
112  // forward these methods to the public interface for containers
113  bool canCompute() const override;
114  void compute() override;
115 
116  InterfacePtr pendingBackward() const { return pending_backward_; }
117  InterfacePtr pendingForward() const { return pending_forward_; }
118 
119 protected:
120  ContainerBasePrivate(ContainerBase* me, const std::string& name);
121 
122  // Set child's push interfaces: allow pushing if child requires it.
123  inline void setChildsPushBackwardInterface(StagePrivate* child) {
124  InterfaceFlags required = child->requiredInterface();
125  bool allowed = (required & WRITES_PREV_END);
126  child->setPrevEnds(allowed ? pending_backward_ : InterfacePtr());
127  }
128  inline void setChildsPushForwardInterface(StagePrivate* child) {
129  InterfaceFlags required = child->requiredInterface();
130  bool allowed = (required & WRITES_NEXT_START);
131  child->setNextStarts(allowed ? pending_forward_ : InterfacePtr());
132  }
133 
135  void copyState(Interface::iterator external, const InterfacePtr& target, bool updated);
137  void liftSolution(const SolutionBasePtr& solution, const InterfaceState* internal_from,
138  const InterfaceState* internal_to);
139 
140  auto& internalToExternalMap() { return internal_to_external_; }
141  const auto& internalToExternalMap() const { return internal_to_external_; }
142 
143  // set in resolveInterface()
144  InterfaceFlags required_interface_;
145 
146 private:
147  container_type children_;
148 
149  // map start/end states of children (internal) to corresponding states in our external interfaces
150  std::map<const InterfaceState*, InterfaceState*> internal_to_external_;
151 
152  /* TODO: these interfaces don't need to be priority-sorted.
153  * Introduce base class UnsortedInterface (which is a plain list) for this use case. */
154  // interface to receive children's sendBackward() states
155  InterfacePtr pending_backward_;
156  // interface to receive children's sendForward() states
157  InterfacePtr pending_forward_;
158 };
159 PIMPL_FUNCTIONS(ContainerBase)
160 
161 /* A solution of a SerialContainer needs to connect start to end via a full path.
162  * The solution of a single child stage is usually disconnected to the container's start or end.
163  * Only if all the children in the chain have found a coherent solution from start to end,
164  * this solution can be announced as a solution of the SerialContainer.
165  */
166 class SerialContainerPrivate : public ContainerBasePrivate
167 {
168  friend class SerialContainer;
169 
170 public:
171  SerialContainerPrivate(SerialContainer* me, const std::string& name);
172 
173  // called by parent asking for pruning of this' interface
174  void resolveInterface(InterfaceFlags expected) override;
175  // validate connectivity of chain
176  void validateConnectivity() const override;
177 
178  void reset();
179 
180 protected:
181  // connect two neighbors
182  void connect(StagePrivate& stage1, StagePrivate& stage2);
183 
184  // validate that child's interface matches mine (considering start or end only as determined by mask)
185  template <unsigned int mask>
186  void validateInterface(const StagePrivate& child, InterfaceFlags required) const;
187 };
188 PIMPL_FUNCTIONS(SerialContainer)

195 class WrappedSolution : public SolutionBase
196 {
197 public:
198  explicit WrappedSolution(StagePrivate* creator, const SolutionBase* wrapped, double cost, std::string comment)
199  : SolutionBase(creator, cost, std::move(comment)), wrapped_(wrapped) {}
200  explicit WrappedSolution(StagePrivate* creator, const SolutionBase* wrapped, double cost)
201  : SolutionBase(creator, cost), wrapped_(wrapped) {}
202  explicit WrappedSolution(StagePrivate* creator, const SolutionBase* wrapped)
203  : WrappedSolution(creator, wrapped, wrapped->cost()) {}
204  void fillMessage(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution& solution,
205  Introspection* introspection = nullptr) const override;
206 
207 private:
208  const SolutionBase* wrapped_;
209 };

241 class MergerPrivate : public ParallelContainerBasePrivate
242 {
243  friend class Merger;
244 
245  moveit::core::JointModelGroupPtr jmg_merged_;
246  using ChildSolutionList = std::vector<const SubTrajectory*>;
247  using ChildSolutionMap = std::map<const StagePrivate*, ChildSolutionList>;
248  // map from external source state (iterator) to all corresponding children's solutions
249  std::map<InterfaceState*, ChildSolutionMap> source_state_to_solutions_;
250 
251 public:
252  using Spawner = std::function<void(SubTrajectory&&)>;
253  MergerPrivate(Merger* me, const std::string& name);
254 
255  void resolveInterface(InterfaceFlags expected) override;
256 
257  void onNewPropagateSolution(const SolutionBase& s);
258  void onNewGeneratorSolution(const SolutionBase& s);
259  void mergeAnyCombination(const ChildSolutionMap& all_solutions, const SolutionBase& current,
260  const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& start_scene, const Spawner& spawner);
261  void merge(const ChildSolutionList& sub_solutions, const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& start_scene,
262  const Spawner& spawner);
263 
264  void sendForward(SubTrajectory&& t, const InterfaceState* from);
265  void sendBackward(SubTrajectory&& t, const InterfaceState* to);
266 };
